No.,1 Student and Staff Training in Educational Television Stations -
Art Weld ”
A survey of the staff and student training programs of 13
educational television stations. Trends in training may be
studied by comparing this study with an earlier one done in
1953 (TV Operations Committee Report No. 6). June, 1956.
13 pp. Paper. 500
■ffo. ^ Compensation of Faculty for Appearances on Educational Television
Programs - Jack McBride 
Summary statements from 26 educational institutions regularly
producing educational TV programs (either over their own stations
or commercial facilities) concerning the problem of compensation
for faculty members appearing on ETV programs. Trends in this
still evolving problem area may be studied by comparing this
report with an earlier one issued in 1954 (TV Operations Committee
Report No. 7). June, 1956. 15 pp. Paper. 500
